law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 485, sec. 32, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1979 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 3, effective May 12, 1979. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 321, sec. 8. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 8. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 77. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 7. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 5. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 4. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Total and permanent disability -- Allowances -- Exception
